rows.label: tev018291_MSG0001
rows.name: Aw, geez. I dunno what I'm gonna do...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0002
rows.name:
A guy by the name of Oll Valdileo asked me to make
a weapon that even a Prone can use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0003
rows.name:
But I don't know beans about the Prone, or how they
fight, or even what level of tech they're comfortable
with![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0004
rows.name:
I've discussed it with the guys, but no one has any clue
what we should make for them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0005
rows.name:
And when I ask Oll what he wants, the only feedback
I get is "something good."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0006
rows.name: So what should I make? Do you have any ideas?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_JNK0010
rows.name: Suggest High Tech[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Cedric to make an advanced laser weapon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_JNK0020
rows.name: Suggest Primitive[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Cedric to make a basic weapon like a club.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0007
rows.name: I...guess that makes sense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0008
rows.name:
After all, they say that their enemies in the Cavern Clan
are stealing human weapons and using them without
any modifications.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0009
rows.name: I guess they're more nimble than they look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0010
rows.name:
Thanks a lot. I'm gonna put all of my weapon-crafting
skills into this baby![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0011
rows.name:
That Oll Valdileo is going to end up with one heck of
a laser rifle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0012
rows.name:
Heck, maybe it'll even help deepen our friendship with
the Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0013
rows.name:
I guess that makes sense. I mean, as opposed to a
laser rifle or something.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0014
rows.name:
...Yeah, you're right. I should make a simple weapon
that allows the Prone to use their great strength to
maximum advantage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0015
rows.name:
Bludgeoning weapons are way outside of my field of
expertise, but I think I can figure something out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0016
rows.name:
Heh. I'm going to make Oll Valdileo a club like he's
never seen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev018291_MSG0017
rows.name:
Heck, maybe it'll even help deepen our friendship with
the Prone.[ST:wait ]
